thread.title_full: Amal Clooney in Giambattista Valli While in Paris - Vogue

title: Amal Clooney in Giambattista Valli While in Paris - Vogue
text: Amal Clooney Blooms in Paris for Date Night With George February 26, 2017 3:09 AM by Edward Barsamian Photo: AKM-GSI After making a remarkable entrance alongside husband George at last night’s César Awards in custom Atelier Versace , tonight in Paris Amal Clooney proved fashion lightning does strike twice. While taking in the sights earlier today, Clooney hinted at her growing bump in a mod cape dress from William Vintage , but tonight’s floral and fur-trimmed Giambattista Valli minidress demonstrated that Clooney’s fashion sensibilities aren’t deviating during her pregnancy. Clooney has often sported Valli’s designs for red-carpet and day-to-day occasions, but tonight’s outfit married both aesthetics. The floral motif could be considered a sartorial nod to her blossoming state, while the fur trim adds a luxe touch to combat the Parisian chill. To-the-knee lace-up boots added a sultry twist to the overly girlish frock while a satin clutch provided sophisticated polish. In This Story: Amal Clooney Recommended For You
